lines.text: Maybe... that isn't a bottle they bought. Maybe they bottled it!
Maybe the charcoal briquette here was a victim of a virgin's blood harvesting operation gone bad!
Whydah, test this blood to see if it matches the blood in the corpse!
Th-that would require extracting blood from the body. And...
Oh. Right. We can't touch stuff.
Why do we even care about not disturbing the evidence? We ARE the police investigation!
We're the ones the evidence is supposed to be left in place FOR!
Long story short: way too many illegal search and seizure lawsuits.
M-most of them funded by organized crime. They don't like it when I do my job, so...
They do their best to try and regulate the police out of existence, by using lawyers to scare us into walking on eggshells.
Hey, go organized crime! Sticking it to the man!
I like regulating the police out of existence. How much tastier can the irony get?
Feh. Get back to work, Seeker.
